issues.economy: Our fully costed manifesto will cut taxes for frontline NHS services and for ordinary families.
issues.education: We will deliver a bright and bold future by investing in improving schools and taking real action on climate change.
issues.environment: We will deliver a bright and bold future by investing in improving schools and taking real action on climate change.
issues.health: Our fully costed manifesto will cut taxes for frontline NHS services and for ordinary families.
issues.socialWelfare: Our fully costed manifesto will cut taxes for frontline NHS services and for ordinary families.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jo is working hard on local issues like opposing the Titan Prison... Jo really listens to local people and works for you.

quotes.text: We need an MP with knowledge, experience and action not a newcomer who used to believe government spin.
It's a University lecturer seems a good idea - she thinks for herself and that's what problems about.
It's a two-horse race here. Last time the Lib Dems were just 500 votes behind the Conservatives...
I was impressed by the support Jo Crotty and the Liberal Democrats are giving to help complete the building of the ramp access to the busy railway station...
After living in a Tory area, it makes such a difference having Lib Dem councillors. Jo works hard as a local councillor and my life is wonderful.

images.caption: Who will deliver FOR YOU as our next MP?
What local people say about Jo Crotty
Putting Warrington first Delivering real change for you
